professional_summary: Database Administrator with over 3 years of experience designing, implementing, and maintaining SQL Server solutions in an Enterprise environment. A detail-oriented, reliable, responsible, and self-motivated team player.

key_responsibilities: Configuring and monitoring AlwaysOn availability groups
Setting up and monitoring database mirroring
Migration of on premises databases to Azure
Identifying and fixing slow running queries
and QA team to maintain all database environments
Performing technical analysis and troubleshooting on complex database problems
Collaborating with internal and external leadership to provide actionable data
Oversseeing quality plan for service center and recommending improvements
Providing quality feedback to team leaders
Preparing and analyzing reports to improve response

education.degree: Associate of Arts in Early Childhood Development
